channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Someone has left rubbish in the same spot between 76 and 78 riverdale road on the pavement., 31st October
item.description:
A washing machine box has been in that spot since 24th Oct. Between 76 and 78 Riverdale road. One person or people habitually leaves bulky rubbish in that spot. Inside is also other bits of rubbish like plastic bottles and polystyrene. It has now blown into the road and blocking parking spaces.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverdale Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves built up not cleared alone with dog poo, 31st October
item.description:
Outside my house 80 henslowe road there is a lot of leaves building up outside and in my front garden. Surprisingly I have no tree outside yet have the most leaves, this needs clearing as it's very deep and dog poo added to the problem which is hidden in the leaves. We are near the park so easy target for dog walkers. I have had a long day and to come home to dog poo leaves stuck to my shoes into my house is really upsetting. So please can you get this area cleaned thanks so much
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Henslowe Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins on footway 99 Eversley Avenue DA7 6RQ, 31st October
item.description:
The beens has been there for over an year. Chikd bumped into one of the bins causing massive bruise under its eye.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eversley Avenue, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights are phasing incorrectly, 31st October
item.description:
The traffic lights here are not working properly - they are too short so there is a lot of beeping right outside our house
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100-138, Camberwell Grove, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 31st October
item.description:
The car has been parked here for at least 2 years. It hasn’t moved. There is moss growing underneath it, it’s been there for so long. I believe the owners have moved house and I don’t know if there is an intention to come back for it but it should have gone with them. It is parked in a residential car park and I and other residents would like it gone.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowden Road, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 80 Neal street - punjab Restaurant, 31st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51-53, Neal Street, Bloomsbury, London

item.title: Human faces on door entrance, 31st October
item.description:
Someone has taken an actual human dump on our entrance door. It’s a health hazard and even more so with all the kids trick or treating and people walking past. We need someone to come disinfect asap please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
